title: States List Send
description: For a given country, returns a list of States of that country. This is useful to populate the account opening form.

states_list.title: States list
states_list.description: Client's 2-letter country code (obtained from residence_list call)

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
